00055 
00056     //
00057     // generic interface header
00058     //
00059 
00060     USHORT Size;
00061     USHORT Version;
00062     PVOID Context;                      // not actually used in this interface

00064     PINTERFACE_DEREFERENCE InterfaceDereference;
00065

00067     // Pci data.
00068     //
00069

00074     //
00075

00077     PCARDBUSDELETE DeleteCardBus;
00078     PCARDBUSPCIDISPATCH DispatchPnp;
00079 
00080 
00081 } PCI_CARDBUS_INTERFACE_PRIVATE, *PPCI_CARDBUS_INTERFACE_PRIVATE;
